name: Rescuer
description:
Ryan is a military graduate who is called in to investigate a strange region where a guy is suspected of turning people into robots.
Upon arriving in the region, Ryan meets some survivors who request his help to recover the place and the people. Among them is Johnnie, the leader of the survivors, who gives some missions, so that Ryan can help.
The region dominated by Matthew, in an ascending empire, will now have a new enemy, who has come to try to take the villain from the throne.

Rule and rescue the region in this incredible story!


  • 1 - Discoverer
  • 2 - Stealing a cargo
  • 3 - A boat ride
  • 4 - The entrusted
  • 5 - Recovering what has always been ours
  • 6 - Hidden cave
  • 7 - Resolution


  • 4 rifles
  • Equipment for rifles
  • Pistol
  • Smoke grenade
  • Explosive grenade
  • Customizations (Muffler, scope, flashlight)


  • - General utility store on the map (to buy weapon attachments).
  • - Weapon shop (to buy any of the weapons available).


  • Collectibles available on the map.
  • Customizable weapons


The Rutianland region is scattered with details, items and easter eggs. Explore, discover, have fun!

Master everything in Rescuer!
